抱.definition: to hold; to carry (in one's arms); to hug; to embrace; to surround; to cherish; (coll.) (of clothes) to fit nicely

抱不平.definition: to be outraged by an injustice (done to sb else)

抱佛腳.definition: lit. to clasp the Buddha's feet (without ever having burned incense) (idiom); fig. to profess devotion only when in trouble; panic measures in place of timely preparation

抱團.definition: to band together; to team up

抱大腿.definition: (coll.) to cling to sb influential or famous

抱定.definition: to hold on firmly; to cling (to a belief); stubbornly

抱怨.definition: to complain; to grumble; to harbor a complaint; to feel dissatisfied

抱恨終天.definition: (idiom) to harbor regrets for a lifetime

抱恨黃泉.definition: (idiom) to harbor regrets into the afterlife

抱成一團.definition: to band together; to gang up; to stick together

抱抱.definition: to hug; to give a cuddle

抱抱裝.definition: "hug shirt" worn by members of the Free Hugs Campaign (see 抱抱團|抱抱团[bao4 bao4 tuan2])

抱拳.definition: to cup one's fist in the other hand (as a sign of respect)

抱持.definition: to hold (expectations, hopes etc); to maintain (an attitude etc); to harbor (doubts etc); to clinch (boxing)

抱朴子.definition: Baopuzi, collection of essays by Ge Hong 葛洪[Ge3 Hong2] on alchemy, immortality, legalism, society etc

抱枕.definition: bolster; a long pillow or cushion

抱歉.definition: to be sorry; to feel apologetic; sorry!

抱殘守缺.definition: to cherish the outmoded and preserve the outworn (idiom); conservative; stickler for tradition

抱犢崮.definition: Mt Baodugu in Lanling County 蘭陵縣|兰陵县[Lan2 ling2 Xian4] in Linyi 臨沂|临沂[Lin2 yi2], south Shandong

抱病.definition: to be ill; to be in poor health

抱睡.definition: to hold a baby or child while they sleep; to spoon with one's partner

抱粗腿.definition: to latch on to the rich and powerful

抱薪救火.definition: lit. to carry firewood to put out a fire (idiom); fig. to make a problem worse by inappropriate action

抱頭.definition: to put one's hands behind one's head, fingers interlaced; to hold one's head in one's hands (in dismay, fright etc); to cover one's head with one's hands (for protection)

抱頭痛哭.definition: to weep disconsolately; to cry on each other's shoulder

抱頭鼠竄.definition: to cover one's head and sneak away like a rat (idiom); to flee ignominiously

抱頭鼠躥.definition: to cover one's head and sneak away like a rat (idiom); to flee ignominiously; also written 抱頭鼠竄|抱头鼠窜
